alert.note: Alert for Lyman (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued October 13 at 7:44AM MDT until further notice by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Aberdeen SD has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in South Dakota... Cedar Creek near Presho affecting Lyman County. .Heavy rainfall will increase the severity of flooding on the Cedar Creek River near Presho. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Cedar Creek near Presho. * WHEN...From this morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Flooding begins to affect the lower lying pasture lands. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 AM CDT Friday the stage was 12.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:15 AM CDT Friday was 12.1 feet. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/abr. The next statement will be issued by Saturday afternoon.Saturday afternoon at 100 PM CDT.
